Unknown, Diwan of Jami Manuscript. 16th century manuscript, Iran. The Museum of Islamic Art, Qatar.
Unknown, Portrait of Hasan 'Ali Mirza Shuja al-Saltana. 1800 - 1850 portrait, Iran. The Museum of Islamic Art, Qatar.
Unknown, Page from the Shahnama. 1525 - 1535 manuscript, Iran. The Museum of Islamic Art, Qatar.
Al-Hajj Hafiz Muhammad Nuri, The Dala'il al-Khayrat of al-Juzuli. 1801 manuscript, Turkey. The Museum of Islamic Art, Qatar.

Wax is a minimal computing project for producing digital exhibitions focused on impact, durability, ease, and flexibility. Our underlying technology is made to learn and to teach, and can produce beautifully rendered, high-quality image collections and scholarly exhibits. To start using Wax, please see our documentation for installation instructions and more.

All images in this demo are from The Museum of Islamic Art, Qatar, courtesy of WikiMedia and Google Art Project.
